A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I've never posted a review before\, but as a die-hard Star Wars fan I had let this fly. I thought this was a pretty bad Star Wars movie. The biggest problem I had was what they did with Luke Skywalker's character arc. This guy IS Star Wars and I couldn't be more disappointed with what they did to him\, and that it is cannon now. We also got no pay off for Snoke or Rey's parents\, which were played-up in Force Awakens. Finally\, I found myself not caring about the side characters that took up 70% of the screen time at all. Considering all of this\, plus a ridiculous Leia scene\, I left the theater very disappointed\, and worried about the future of Star Wars.
